page.title: 17GOODNESTONE POST OFFICE
page.content: Goodnestone Post Office is small. They sell almost everything. They have a section for household medicines, sweets, household needs, a section for gifts. Mrs Meadows is the shop_keeper and Mr Meadows is the Post_Master. Mr Meadows delivers his newspapers to Goodnestone and Chillenden. The most popular newspaper is the 'Mirror'. The most popular comic is 'Warplane'. Mrs Meadows told us that on average 86 people come in a day. I asked Mrs Meadows why children come to the Post Office, she said to buy sweets and drinks. They get their stocks from 'Cash and Carry' in Canterbury. 'Cash and Carry' is a warehouse for shopkeepers.
